name: Burg_92
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Island Creole loanwords
diet centered on salted fish, seaweed, and shellfish
tide-linked rituals and seasonal boat blessings
crafts: net-making, tarred rope, small-boat carpentry
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: navigational auguries used but do not replace charts
small harbor requires annual dredging; dredge taxes contentious
